roleset.name: recognize
roleset.note: DESCRY-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: recognize (30.2) (from descry.01-v predicate notes)

roles.note: To discern, detect, catch sight of (from descry.01-v)

example.name: All arguments
example.text: The boys had to learn English and American culture on the fly, a process WHNP-0-1 he descried *-1 as "tough but fun."

example.name: Different sort of attribute
example.text: As she sat alone in the dim light of the evening, she descried a lioness, her jaws reeking with recent slaughter.
example.arg: As she sat alone in the dim light of the evening
her jaws reeking with recent slaughter.
